p: All experiments have been performed on an Intel Xeon CPU X5650 @ 2.67GHz GNU/Linux 2.6.18-164.el5 supercomputer, using R programming language version 3.3.3. For other required packages the following versions were used: mblm 0.12 and KernSmooth 2.23â€“15. We provide the R code as S2 File. This code is provided under the GNU general public license v3.
